goal: My partner and I are flying with our cat. Book two seats on a pet-friendly FlyUnified flight from ATL to DEN for October 12th. Afterwards, schedule a UDriver Pet to the Atlanta airport, making sure we arrive three hours before departure. Then, add a reminder to my GoCalendar for October 10th to 'Call vet for Fido's travel certificate'.

evals.description: Verify that a FlyUnified flight booking was made for 2 passengers and 1 pet from ATL to DEN on October 12th.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a UDriver Pet ride was scheduled with the Atlanta airport as the destination.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a GoCalendar reminder was created for October 10th with the title 'Call vet for Fido's travel certificate'.
evals.query: length(gocalendar.events[?date=='2024-10-10' && title=='Call vet for Fido''s travel certificate'])
